summary: Implements SpecAugment masking by zeroing out random continuous frequency or time segments of input spectrograms, using a Numba CUDA kernel to edit the data in-place while parallelizing over frequency, time, and batch dimensions.
business_intent: Provide a high‑performance GPU‑accelerated augmentation step for audio spectrograms in deep‑learning pipelines, reducing training time while preserving the benefits of SpecAugment.
